>I earned my **PhD** in [Demography](https://hcap.utsa.edu/demography/) at the [University of Texas at San Antonio (UTSA)](https://www.utsa.edu/) in Spring 2021. My dissertation looked at the association of alcohol, health and mortality in the United States. Currently I am employed as a **Graduate Research Assistant** in the TxDOT project at the [Institute for Demographic and Socioeconomic Research (IDSER)](https://idser.utsa.edu/) at UTSA.

#### My research interests are:

      - Population and Health 
      - Aging 
      - Race and Ethnicity
      - Health Disparities 
      - Mental Health 
      - Causal inference

>I am looking for a postdoctoral position starting in late summer 2021 to further my career in academia.
